title: SpaceX to compete in Pentagon contest for autonomous drone tech: Report
description: Texas-based SpaceX recently acquired xAI in ​a deal that combined Musk's major space and defense contractor with the ​billionaire entrepreneur's artificial intelligence startup. It occurred ahead of SpaceX's planned initial public offering this year.

title: India's tougher AI social media rules spark censorship fears
description: India has tightened rules governing the use of artificial intelligence on social media to combat a flood of disinformation, but also prompting warnings of censorship and an erosion of digital freedoms. With more than a billion internet users, India is grappling with AI-generated disinformation swamping social media.
content:

title: Indian shares set to open lower with analysts expecting post-earnings consolidation
description: India's benchmark indexes are set to open marginally lower, with analysts expecting a consolidation phase following a largely in-line earnings season, while tech stocks await direction from the ongoing Artificial Intelligence Impact Summit.
content: Feb 17 (Reuters) - India's benchmark indexes are set to open marginally lower, with analysts expecting a consolidation phase following a largely in-line earnings season, while tech stocks await direction from the ongoing Artificial Intelligence Impac... [1367 chars]

title: Prasoon Joshi says India will assimilate and lead in the world of AI courtesy our cultural history
description: At the AI Impact Summit 2026, Prasoon Joshi emphasizes how India's cultural history can drive the world of artificial intelligence, showcasing the nation's capacity for assimilation and creative storytelling.
content: Prasoon Joshi, the well-known lyricist and head of the CBFC, was a special guest at a panel hosted by the Motion Picture Association. This event, held in collaboration with FICCI at the AI Impact Summit 2026, provided a platform for him to share his ... [1997 chars]

title: French President Macron arrives in India for AI impact summit, talks with PM Modi
description: French President Emmanuel Macron has arrived in India for a three-day visit focused on bolstering artificial intelligence cooperation and strategic ties. He will meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi to review bilateral progress and discuss global developments. The visit aims to translate the momentum from last year's AI summit in Paris into concrete outcomes in India.
content:

title: India Deep Tech Alliance pencils $1 billion for AI as members plan $2.5 billion play
description: The India Deep Tech Alliance (IDTA) is set to announce increased investments in the artificial intelligence and deeptech ecosystem on Tuesday. IDTA members have collectively committed more than $2.5 billion over five years, with $1 billion earmarked for AI deployment within three years, IDTA chair Arun Kumar told ET.
content:

title: AI tools will support, not replace, clinical expertise: Roy Jakobs, CEO of Philips
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) tools could begin handling parts of routine hospital documentation this year, according to Roy Jakobs, chief executive officer of Philips| India News
content:
“This year alone, we can expect to see ‘AI agents’ take on non-clinical work within clinical software and imaging systems, from ambient voice transcription to drafting report conclusions and supporting workflows,” he said.

title: India is becoming ElevenLabs’ key growth engine as enterprises scale voice AI: CEO Mati Staniszewski
description: India is already the second-largest market for ElevenLabs and is fast turning into one of its biggest growth engines, as enterprises scale voice artificial intelligence across customer service, sales and operations, the company’s cofounder and chief executive Mati Staniszewski said.

title: Battered IT loses weight on Nifty, banking hits new high
description: Information Technology stocks are losing their grip on the Nifty index. Banks are now more influential, their share in the key index reaching new highs. This shift reflects changing earnings trajectories and investor sentiment. Overseas investors have significantly reduced their exposure to Indian IT. The impact of Artificial Intelligence disruption is a key concern for the sector.
content:
